*[Bug 18787] New: Remove unnecessary code from glyphFont()*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18787>

            Bug ID: 18787
           Summary: Remove unnecessary code from glyphFont()
           Product: R
           Version: R 4.4.x
          Hardware: Other
                OS: Other
            Status: UNCONFIRMED
          Severity: normal
          Priority: P5
         Component: Misc
          Assignee: <mailto:R-core@R-project.org|R-core@R-project.org>
          Reporter: <mailto:elin.waring@gmail.com|elin.waring@gmail.com>

As discussed in bug 18784 `glyphFont()` is structured for a single font
(`glyphList()` is for multiple fonts). 
However, some of the code is written as though it accepts multiple fonts. 
This means there is some unnecessary code, but also that there should probably
be a check that there is only one font provided (or explicit handling of ) that
case.
